creator: chennak.s@intellicus.com
text:
Created attachment 33870
3d chart drawn directly in excel

3D charts can be drawn through Excel, but when we are using poi, 3d chart support is not given.

https://poi.apache.org/spreadsheet/limitations.html

3D Charts are not currently supported. If this is important to you, maybe you would like to develop and contribute this support. There is some information here: https://poi.apache.org/spreadsheet/chart.html and https://poi.apache.org/guidelines.html.

If you have questions, you can ask on this list.
creator: jmarkmurph@yahoo.com

text: Able to create 3D charts. POI is already supporting this feature.
creator: chennak.s@intellicus.com
